title: Bug 3666: CodeCompletion Hungry code assist (1GDRYW5)
OB: Under certain circumstances, the code assist feature consumes excessive code.
EB: The code assist feature should only replace the necessary code and not consume excessive code.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Modify the code to: baz(x.foo().foo())
2. Verify that the resulting code should be: baz(x.foo()x.foo())
